definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
not understanding things (idiom); devoid of sense

sentences.english: Sam Sleiman is the Director of Capital Programs and Environmental Affairs for Massport.
sentences.chinese: 山姆史莱蒙，是麻州港务局的环境事理主任。

sentences.english: The light changed and they drove on, but Hannah was too young to be reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 灯变绿了他们继续开着，但是汉娜太小不知事理。

sentences.english: Using cues, clues and hints to detect the hidden relationships.
sentences.chinese: 运用各种暗示点对隐藏的事理逻辑线索进行探查。

sentences.english: I envy you for giving such a personable and astute son gifted in both cultural and military affairs.
sentences.chinese: 朕羡慕你，有这样识大体明事理，且文武兼备的儿子。

sentences.english: Something will dawn on you as time goes on.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，有些事理你会慢慢渐悟的。
他说话既亲切又明事理。

sentences.english: He spoke with both kindness and understanding.
sentences.chinese: 他说话既亲切又明事理。

sentences.english: This hexagram applies this philosophical thought to revealing the principles.
sentences.chinese: 本卦就运用了这一哲学思想来言说事理。

sentences.english: She has a cherry red mouth, from the inside out is all big stuff.
sentences.chinese: 她有一张樱桃红的嘴巴，从里面说出的满是年夜事理。

sentences.english: He really thinks he has a monopoly on the truth.
sentences.chinese: 他真以为唯有他明事理。

sentences.english: You should know better than to behave like that.
sentences.chinese: 你应当明白事理，不该那么不懂规矩。

sentences.english: Anyone with a lick of common sense knows that one must never haphazardly medicate oneself.
sentences.chinese: 任何人只要稍通事理，都知道绝不该如此滥服成药。

sentences.english: She was about the only person there who knew better than to kill animals.
sentences.chinese: 她是那里唯一一个明白事理，不杀生的人。

sentences.english: I'll make him study and understand things.
sentences.chinese: 我会让他学习，明白事理。

sentences.english: Your father is more understanding than mine by far.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲远比我父亲更明白事理。

sentences.english: You have awareness of global inequity, which we did not have.
sentences.chinese: 有了这种意识，你很可能就会有明事理的良心。

definition: sensible/reasonable/an obvious reason, truth or fact/to understand the reason or reasoning
lit. right and wrong, crooked and straight (idiom); fig. merits and demerits/pros and cons
doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)
not understanding things (idiom); devoid of sense
worldly wisdom/the ways of the world/to know how to get on in the world
pros and cons/advantages and disadvantages/gains and losses
fair and reasonable (idiom); sensible/standing to reason
to have a high notion of one's duty/to be highly principled
